title: V53 “NEXUS OLYMPUS” overwrite + compile-safe mechanical fixes (frontend-only)

requirements.summary: Fully overwrite AppV1.jsx with the exact user-provided V53 “NEXUS OLYMPUS” implementation while preserving the specified local datasets, UI, styling, and logic.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` matches the user-provided V53 code content as the application UI implementation (intro -> landing -> client -> pro studio).
The app continues to mount via the existing `frontend/src/App.tsx` wrapper that renders `AppV1`.

file_operations.description: Delete all existing file content and replace it with the exact V53 “NEXUS OLYMPUS” code block supplied by the user, preserving all imports, components, Tailwind classes, UI strings, interaction logic, and the local seed data/constants explicitly called out (SWISS_DB, SHOWREEL, INITIAL_SALONS, PROFESSIONS, RICH_PRESETS).

requirements.summary: Apply only minimal mechanical fixes needed for this repo so V53 compiles and runs without altering intended V53 UI/UX or the five pillars (intro showreel, native share, WhatsApp booking, Swiss location suggestions, cinematic dark UI).
acceptanceCriteria: Build succeeds with no TypeScript/JSX compile errors after the overwrite.
On launch, the Olympus Intro showreel is displayed full-screen and only entering proceeds to the app.
Tapping a Share action uses `navigator.share` when available; when unavailable, the fallback path executes without crashing.

Confirming a booking generates a working WhatsApp `wa.me` link with a prefilled message that includes salon name, selected services, selected date/time, location context (including address for domicile), and total price.
The location input shows suggestions by ZIP prefix or city substring using the in-file `SWISS_DB` dataset.

file_operations.description: After the V53 paste, make strictly mechanical, build-blocking fixes only (e.g., add/adjust missing imports, remove duplicate exports, fix invalid JSX/React usage, resolve undefined identifiers) while keeping the V53 layout, Tailwind styling, copy, and interaction behavior unchanged—specifically preserving: full-screen Olympus Intro gating, `navigator.share` with safe fallback, WhatsApp `wa.me` deep-link message composition, SWISS_DB-powered location suggestions, and the cinematic dark UI/trust badges.
